system.effect:
Pok√©mon of at least Level 20 with this Capability can produce a coin item once a day as an Extended Action. Roll 1d20 when this Capability is used. On a roll of 7-12, a Relic Copper is produced. On a roll of 13-18, a Relic Silver is produced. On a roll of 19-20, a Relic Gold is produced.
Relic Bronze: $100
Relic Silver: $300
Relic Gold: $1,000
Gimmighoul Only: Gimmighoul creates Gimmighoul coins instead of Relic Items at a rate of 1d20 x 5 coins per action.
